snippet.title: Good Heavens! - Official World Premiere Gameplay and Developer Interview | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Good Heavens! is an cozy crafting RPG in a world made of floating lands in the afterlife. It’s an open-world sandbox game where you build and improve your base and character. There are multiple skill paths to level up as a farmer, warrior, cook, or trader - which make it the perfect game to play with friends.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/1617120/

#IGN #Gaming #IGNSummerOfGaming
